card.name: ·The One Ring, Isildur's Bane
card.text: Response: If bearer is about to take a wound, he wears The One Ring until the regroup phase. While wearing The One Ring, each time the Ring-bearer is about to take a wound, add 2 burdens instead.

card.name: ·The One Ring, The Ruling Ring
card.text: Response: If bearer is about to take a wound in a skirmish, he wears The One Ring until the regroup phase. While wearing The One Ring, each time the Ring-bearer is about to take a wound during a skirmish, add a burden instead.

card.name: Axe Strike
card.text: Skirmish: Make a Dwarf strength +2 (or +3 if bearing a {Dwarven} hand weapon).

card.name: Battle Fury
card.text: Skirmish: Exert a Dwarf to make that Dwarf strength +3 and damage +1.

card.name: Cleaving Blow
card.text: Skirmish: Make a Dwarf strength +2 and damage +1.

card.name: Delving
card.text: Fellowship: Exert a Dwarf companion to draw 3 cards.

card.name: Dwarf Guard
card.text: To play, spot a Dwarf.

card.name: Dwarven Armor
card.text: Bearer must be a Dwarf. Bearer may not be overwhelmed unless his or her strength is tripled.

card.name: Dwarven Axe
card.text: Bearer must be a Dwarf. Each time a player's minion loses a skirmish to bearer, that player discards the top card from his or her draw deck.

card.name: Dwarven Heart
card.text: Bearer must be a Dwarf. When you play this condition, heal bearer up to 2 times. At the start of each of your turns, exert bearer.

card.name: ·Farin, Dwarven Emissary
card.text: To play, spot a Dwarf. While skirmishing an Orc, Farin is strength +2.

card.name: ·Gimli, Dwarf of Erebor
card.text: Damage +1. Fellowship: If the twilight pool has fewer than 2 twilight tokens, add {2} to place a card from hand beneath your draw deck.

card.name: ·Gimli, Son of Glóin
card.text: Damage +1. Skirmish: Exert Gimli to make him strength +2.

card.name: ·Gimli's Battle Axe
card.text: Bearer must be Gimli. He is damage +1. Each time Gimli wins a skirmish, you may wound an Orc.

card.name: ·Gimli's Helm
card.text: Bearer must be Gimli. He takes no more than 1 wound during each skirmish phase. Skirmish: Discard Gimli's Helm to prevent all wounds to him.

card.name: ·Greatest Kingdom of My People
card.text: Tale. Exert a Dwarf to play this condition. Plays to your support area. Each time your opponent plays an Orc, that player discards the top card of his or her draw deck.

card.name: ·Grimir, Dwarven Elder
card.text: Fellowship: Exert Grimir to shuffle a {Dwarven} event from your discard pile into your draw deck.

card.name: Halls of My Home
card.text: Fellowship: Exert a Dwarf to reveal the top 3 cards of any draw deck. You may discard 1 Shadow card revealed. Return the rest in any order.

card.name: Here Lies Balin, Son of Fundin
card.text: Maneuver: Exert a Dwarf to wound 2 Orcs or to wound 1 Orc twice.

card.name: Let Them Come!
card.text: Plays to your support area. Each time a Dwarf wins a skirmish against an Orc, discard that Orc. Discard this condition if a Dwarf loses a skirmish.

card.name: Lord of Moria
card.text: Plays to your support area. Each Dwarf is damage +1.

card.name: Mithril Shaft
card.text: Maneuver: Exert a Dwarf to discard cards from the top of your draw deck until you choose to stop (limit 5). Add {1} for each card discarded in this way. Take the last card discarded into hand.

card.name: Nobody Tosses a Dwarf
card.text: Response: If a Dwarf wins a skirmish, make an opponent discard 3 cards from the top of his or her draw deck.

card.name: Stairs of Khazad-dûm
card.text: Tale. Plays to your support area. While a Dwarf skirmishes a {Moria} minion, that Dwarf is strength +1.

card.name: Still Draws Breath
card.text: Response: If a Dwarf wins a skirmish, heal that Dwarf.

card.name: Their Halls of Stone
card.text: Skirmish: Make a Dwarf strength +2 (or +4 if at an underground site).

card.name: ·Thrarin, Dwarven Smith
card.text: Maneuver: Exert Thrarin to allow him to participate in archery fire and skirmishes until the regroup phase.

card.name: Wealth of Moria
card.text: Fellowship: Spot a Dwarf to reveal the top 3 cards of your draw deck. Take all Free Peoples cards revealed into hand and discard the rest.

card.name: Ancient Enmity
card.text: Skirmish: Make an Elf strength +1. If a minion loses this skirmish to that Elf, that minion's owner discards 2 cards at random from hand.

card.name: ·Arwen, Daughter Of Elrond
card.text: Ranger. While skirmishing a Nazgûl, Arwen is strength +3.

card.name: ·Asfaloth
card.text: Bearer must be an Elf. When played on Arwen, Asfaloth's twilight cost is -2. While at a plains site, bearer is strength +2. Discard Asfaloth when at an underground site.

card.name: Border Defenses
card.text: Skirmish: Make an Elf strength +2 (or +4 if skirmishing an archer).

card.name: ·Bow of the Galadhrim
card.text: Bearer must be Legolas. Each time Legolas wins a skirmish, you may wound a minion.

card.name: ·Celeborn, Lord Of Lórien
card.text: Fellowship: Exert Celeborn to heal an {Elven} ally.

card.name: The Council of Elrond
card.text: Fellowship: Spot an Elf to play a tale from your draw deck.

card.name: Curse Their Foul Feet!
card.text: Fellowship: Exert an Elf to reveal an opponent's hand. That player discards a card from hand for each Orc revealed.

card.name: Defiance
card.text: Skirmish: Make an Elf strength +2 (or +4 if skirmishing a Nazgûl).

card.name: Double Shot
card.text: Archery: Spot an Elf archer companion to make the fellowship archery total +1.

card.name: Elf-song
card.text: Fellowship: Spot an Elf to remove a burden.

card.name: ·Elrond, Lord Of Rivendell
card.text: To play, spot Gandalf or an Elf. At the start of each of your turns, heal every ally whose home is site 3. Fellowship: Exert Elrond to draw a card.

card.name: Elven Bow
card.text: Bearer must be an Elf. Bearer is an archer.

card.name: Elven Cloak
card.text: To play, spot an Elf. Bearer must be a companion. The minion archery total is -1.

card.name: ·Far-seeing Eyes
card.text: Plays to your support area. Each time you play an Elf, choose an opponent to discard a card from hand.

card.name: Foul Creation
card.text: Fellowship: Exert an Elf to reveal an opponent's hand. You may discard a {Isengard} minion revealed to draw 2 cards.

card.name: ·Galadriel, Lady of Light
card.text: At the start of each of your turns, heal every ally whose home is site 6. Fellowship: Exert Galadriel to play an Elf for free.

card.name: ·Gift of Boats
card.text: To play, exert an Elf ally. Plays to your support area. When the fellowship moves from a river during the fellowship phase, the move limit for this turn is +1.

card.name: ·Gwemegil
card.text: Bearer must be Arwen. She is damage +1. Skirmish: Exert Arwen or discard 2 cards from hand to make her strength +1.

card.name: ·Haldir, Elf Of The Golden Wood
card.text: To play, spot an Elf. While Haldir is at site 6, 7, or 8, he is strength +2.

card.name: The Last Alliance of Elves and Men
card.text: Tale. Bearer must be a {Gondor} Man. Limit 1 per bearer. Bearer is strength +1 for each Elf you can spot (limit +3).

card.name: ·Legolas, Greenleaf
card.text: Archer. Archery: Exert Legolas to wound a minion; Legolas does not add to the fellowship archery total.

card.name: ·Legolas, Prince Of Mirkwood
card.text: Archer. While skirmishing a Nazgûl, Legolas is strength +3.

card.name: Lightfootedness
card.text: Archery: Spot an Elf companion to make the minion archery total -1.

card.name: Lórien Elf
card.text: To play, spot an Elf.

card.name: Mallorn-trees
card.text: Plays to your support area. Fellowship: Reveal an {Elven} card from hand and place it beneath your draw deck.

card.name: ·The Mirror of Galadriel
card.text: Plays to your support area. Each Elf ally whose home is site 6 is strength +1. Maneuver: If an opponent has at least 7 cards in hand, exert Galadriel to look at 2 of those cards at random. Discard one and replace the other.

card.name: ·Orophin, Lórien Bowman
card.text: Archer. Archery: Exert Orophin to wound an Uruk-hai.

card.name: ·Rúmil, Elven Protector
card.text: Archer. Archery: Exert Rumil to wound an Orc.

card.name: The Seen and the Unseen
card.text: Fellowship: Exert 2 Elves to discard a condition.

card.name: Shoulder to Shoulder
card.text: Plays to your support area. Maneuver: Add {1} and exert a Dwarf to heal an Elf, or add {1} and exert an Elf to heal a Dwarf.

card.name: ·Silinde, Elf Of Mirkwood
card.text: While you can spot your site 3, Silinde has the game text of that site.

card.name: Songs of the Blessed Realm
card.text: Plays to your support area. Each time you play an {Elven} tale, you may remove a burden.

card.name: ·The Splendor of Their Banners
card.text: Tale. Bearer must be an Elf companion. Archery: If bearer is an archer, exert bearer to make the fellowship archery total +1.

card.name: Stand Against Darkness
card.text: Maneuver: Exert an Elf to discard a {Sauron} minion, a {Sauron} condition, or a {Sauron} possession.

card.name: Support of the Last Homely House
card.text: Maneuver: Exert an Elf ally whose home is site 3. Until the regroup phase, that ally is strength +3 and participates in archery fire and skirmishes.

card.name: Swan-ship of the Galadhrim
card.text: Maneuver: Exert an Elf ally whose home is site 6. Until the regroup phase, that ally is strength +3 and participates in archery fire and skirmishes.

card.name: ·The Tale of Gil-galad
card.text: Tale. Bearer must be an Elf. Skirmish: Discard this condition to make bearer strength +2.

card.name: ·Uruviel, Maid Of Lórien
card.text: While you can spot your site 6, Uruviel has the game text of that site.

card.name: The White Arrows of Lórien
card.text: Tale. Bearer must be an Elf companion. Archery: If bearer is an archer, exert bearer to make an opponent discard 2 cards at random from hand.

card.name: ·Albert Dreary, Entertainer From Bree
card.text: To play, spot Gandalf. Maneuver: Exert Albert Dreary to discard a {Isengard} or {Moria} condition.

card.name: ·Barliman Butterbur, Prancing Pony Proprietor
card.text: Fellowship: Exert Barliman Butterbur to take a {Gandalf} event into hand from your discard pile.

card.name: Durin's Secret
card.text: Fellowship: Spot Gandalf, a Dwarf, and an Elf to make the move limit for this turn +1.

card.name: ·Gandalf, Friend of the Shirefolk
card.text: Gandalf is strength +1 for each of these races you can spot in the fellowship: Hobbit, Dwarf, Elf, and Man.

card.name: ·Gandalf's Cart
card.text: Plays to your support area. Fellowship: Stack a Free Peoples artifact (or possession) from hand on this card, or play a card stacked here as if played from hand.

card.name: ·Gandalf's Pipe
card.text: Bearer must be Gandalf. Fellowship: Discard a pipeweed possession and spot X pipes to remove X burdens.

card.name: ·Glamdring
card.text: Bearer must be Gandalf. He is damage +1. Fellowship or Regroup: Exert Gandalf to reveal an opponent's hand. Remove {1} for each Orc revealed.

card.name: Intimidate
card.text: Spell. Response: If a companion is about to take a wound, spot Gandalf to prevent that wound.

card.name: Let Folly Be Our Cloak
card.text: Fellowship: Exert X companions to remove {X}.

card.name: Mysterious Wizard
card.text: Spell. Skirmish: Make Gandalf strength +2 (or +4 if there are 4 or fewer burdens on the Ring-bearer).

card.name: The Nine Walkers
card.text: To play, spot Gandalf. Plays to your support area. Each time you play a companion whose race you cannot spot, that companion's twilight cost is -2.

card.name: ·Ottar, Man Of Laketown
card.text: To play, spot Gandalf. Fellowship: Exert Ottar to discard up to 3 cards from hand and draw an equal number of cards.

card.name: Questions That Need Answering
card.text: Spell. Fellowship: If the twilight pool has fewer than 3 twilight tokens, spot Gandalf to look at the top 4 cards of your draw deck. Take 2 of those cards into hand and discard the rest.

card.name: Risk a Little Light
card.text: Spell. Fellowship: If the twilight pool has fewer than 2 twilight tokens, spot Gandalf to look at the top 2 cards of your draw deck. Take one into hand and discard the other.

card.name: Servant of the Secret Fire
card.text: Spell. Skirmish: Spot Gandalf to make a minion strength -3.

card.name: Sleep, Caradhras
card.text: Spell. Fellowship: Exert Gandalf to discard every condition.

card.name: Strength of Spirit
card.text: Spell. Response: If a companion is about to exert, spot Gandalf to place no token for that exertion.

card.name: Treachery Deeper Than You Know
card.text: Spell. Fellowship: Spot Gandalf to reveal an opponent's hand.

card.name: A Wizard Is Never Late
card.text: Fellowship: Play a {Gandalf} character from your draw deck.

card.name: An Able Guide
card.text: Regroup: Spot a ranger to remove {4}.

card.name: ·Aragorn, Ranger of the North
card.text: Ranger. Maneuver: Exert Aragorn to make him defender +1 until the regroup phase.

card.name: ·Aragorn's Bow
card.text: Bearer must be Aragorn. He is an archer. Archery: Exert Aragorn to wound a minion; Aragorn does not add to the fellowship archery total.

card.name: ·Aragorn's Pipe
card.text: Bearer must be a {Gondor} companion. Fellowship: Discard a pipeweed possession and spot X pipes to heal X companions.

card.name: Armor
card.text: Bearer must be a Man. Bearer takes no more than 1 wound during each skirmish phase.

card.name: Arwen's Fate
card.text: Skirmish: Exert Aragorn to make Arwen strength +3, or exert Arwen to make Aragorn strength +3.

card.name: Athelas
card.text: Bearer must be a {Gondor} Man. Fellowship: Discard this possession to heal a companion or to remove a Shadow condition from a companion.

card.name: ·Blade of Gondor
card.text: Bearer must be Boromir. He is damage +1. Skirmish: Exert Boromir to wound an Orc or Uruk-hai he is skirmishing.

card.name: ·Boromir, Lord of Gondor
card.text: Ranger. Boromir is not overwhelmed unless his strength is tripled.

card.name: ·Boromir, Son of Denethor
card.text: Skirmish: Exert Boromir to make a Hobbit strength +3.

card.name: ·Boromir's Cloak
card.text: Bearer must be Boromir. Maneuver: Exert Boromir to discard a weather condition.

card.name: Change of Plans
card.text: Regroup: Exert a ranger to make an opponent shuffle his or her hand into his or her draw deck and draw 8 cards.

card.name: ·The Choice of Lúthien
card.text: Tale. Plays to your support area. Maneuver: Exert Aragorn to heal Arwen, or exert Arwen to heal Aragorn.

card.name: Coat of Mail
card.text: Bearer must be a Man. Bearer may not be overwhelmed unless his strength is tripled.

card.name: Dagger Strike
card.text: Skirmish: Make a {Gondor} or {Shire} companion bearing a hand weapon strength +2 and damage +1.

card.name: Elendil's Valor
card.text: Maneuver: Make a {Gondor} companion defender +1 until the regroup phase.

card.name: Eregion's Trails
card.text: Maneuver: Exert a ranger to make each roaming minion strength -3 until the regroup phase.

card.name: Foes of Mordor
card.text: Plays to your support area. Maneuver: Exert a {Gondor} character to wound a {Sauron} minion.

card.name: Gondor's Vengeance
card.text: Regroup: Exert a ranger companion to discard a minion.

card.name: Great Shield
card.text: Bearer must be a Man. The minion archery total is -1.

card.name: No Stranger to the Shadows
card.text: Bearer must be a ranger. Limit 1 per ranger. Each site's Shadow number is -1.

card.name: One Whom Men Would Follow
card.text: Maneuver: Exert Aragorn and spot an ally. Until the regroup phase, that ally is strength +2 and participates in archery fire and skirmishes.

card.name: Pathfinder
card.text: Fellowship or Regroup: Spot a ranger to play the fellowship's next site (replacing opponent's site if necessary).

card.name: Pursuit Just Behind
card.text: Regroup: Exert a ranger companion to wound every minion.

card.name: ·Ranger's Sword
card.text: Bearer must be Aragorn. He is damage +1.

card.name: A Ranger's Versatility
card.text: Maneuver: Exert a ranger at a river or forest to exhaust a minion.

card.name: ·The Saga of Elendil
card.text: Tale. Bearer must be a {Gondor} companion. Skirmish: Discard this condition to make bearer strength +2.

card.name: Strength of Kings
card.text: Response: If a Skirmish event is played during a skirmish involving a {Gondor} Man, cancel that event.

card.name: Swordarm of the White Tower
card.text: Skirmish: Make a {Gondor} companion strength +2 (or +4 if he or she is defender +1).

card.name: Swordsman of the Northern Kingdom
card.text: Skirmish: Make a ranger strength +2 (or +4 when skirmishing a roaming minion).

card.name: Valiant Man of the West
card.text: Maneuver: Make Aragorn defender +1 and he takes no more than 1 wound during each skirmish phase until the regroup phase.

card.name: What Are They?
card.text: Maneuver: Spot a ranger to discard a roaming minion.

card.name: Alive and Unspoiled
card.text: To play, exert an Uruk-hai. Plays to your support area. Shadow: Remove {3} and spot X burdens to make the Free Peoples player reveal X cards at random from hand. You may discard 1 revealed card.

card.name: Bred for Battle
card.text: Skirmish: Exert an Uruk-hai to make it strength +3.

card.name: Breeding Pit
card.text: Response: If you play an Urukhai, take all copies of that card in your discard pile and place them beneath your draw deck.

card.name: Caradhras Has Not Forgiven Us
card.text: Spell. Weather. Maneuver: Exert a {Isengard} minion and spot 5 companions to discard an exhausted companion (except the Ringbearer).

card.name: Cruel Caradhras
card.text: Spell. Weather. Maneuver: Exert a {Isengard} minion to make the opponent choose to either exert the Ring-bearer or add a burden.

card.name: Greed
card.text: To play, spot an Uruk-hai. Plays to your support area. Maneuver: Spot 6 companions and remove {2} to wound a companion (except the Ring-bearer).

card.name: Hunt Them Down!
card.text: Maneuver: Make an Uruk-hai fierce until the regroup phase.

card.name: ·Lurtz, Servant of Isengard
card.text: Archer. Damage +1. Maneuver: Spot another Uruk-hai to make Lurtz fierce until the regroup phase.

card.name: Lurtz's Battle Cry
card.text: Skirmish: Make an Uruk-hai strength -1 and damage +1.

card.name: The Misadventure of Mr. Underhill
card.text: To play, exert an Uruk-hai. Plays to your support area. The twilight cost of each companion played to a site which is not a sanctuary is +2.

card.name: No Ordinary Storm
card.text: Plays to your support area. Each time you play a weather condition, exert a {Gandalf} companion or {Gandalf} ally.

card.name: ·Orthanc Assassin
card.text: Archer. Damage +1.

card.name: Parry
card.text: Maneuver: Spot an Uruk-hai to cancel the strength bonus from a possession until the regroup phase.

card.name: Saruman's Ambition
card.text: Plays to your support area. The twilight cost of your {Isengard} events is -1. Skirmish: Discard this condition to make an Uruk-hai strength +2.

card.name: Saruman's Chill
card.text: Spell. Weather. To play, exert a {Isengard} minion. Plays on a site. Limit 1 per site. Each Hobbit who moves from this site must exert. Discard this condition at the end of the turn.

card.name: Saruman's Frost
card.text: Spell. Weather. To play, exert a {Isengard} minion. Plays on a site. Limit 1 per site. Each Hobbit at this site is strength -2. Discard this condition at the end of the turn.

card.name: Saruman's Power
card.text: Spell. Shadow: Exert a {Isengard} minion to discard all conditions.

card.name: Saruman's Reach
card.text: Search. Maneuver: Exert an Urukhai to make the opponent choose to either exert 2 companions or make the Ring-bearer put on The One Ring until the regroup phase.

card.name: Saruman's Snows
card.text: Spell. Weather. To play, exert a {Isengard} minion. Plays on a site. No player may play skirmish events or use skirmish special abilities during skirmishes at this site. Discard this condition at the end of the turn.

card.name: Savagery to Match Their Numbers
card.text: Skirmish: Make an Uruk-hai strength +2, or spot 5 companions to make an Uruk-hai strength +4 and fierce until the regroup phase.

card.name: Spies of Saruman
card.text: To play, exert a {Isengard} minion. Plays on a site. While the fellowship is at this site, skip the archery phase. Discard this condition at the end of the turn.

card.name: Their Arrows Enrage
card.text: To play, spot Saruman or an Uruk-hai. Plays to your support area. Each archer companion and archer ally is strength -1.

card.name: Traitor's Voice
card.text: Search. To play, spot an Uruk-hai. Plays to your support area. While the Ringbearer is exhausted or you can spot 5 burdens, the move limit for this turn is -1 (to a minimum of 1).

card.name: Troop of Uruk-hai
card.text: Damage +1. A character skirmishing this minion does not gain strength bonuses from weapons.

card.name: Uruk Bloodlust
card.text: Plays to your support area. Response: If your Uruk-hai wins a skirmish, remove {1} to heal him.

card.name: Uruk Brood
card.text: Damage +1. Skirmish: Remove {2} to make this minion strength +1 for each other Uruk-hai you spot.

card.name: Uruk Fighter
card.text: Damage +1. Maneuver: Spot 5 companions to make this minion fierce until the regroup phase.

card.name: Uruk Guard
card.text: Damage +1. Assignment: Exert this minion and spot a companion to prevent the opponent from assigning that companion to this minion.

card.name: Uruk Lieutenant
card.text: Damage +1. This minion is strength +1 for each other Uruk-hai you can spot.

card.name: Uruk Messenger
card.text: Damage +1. While you can spot a weather condition, this minion is strength +3.

card.name: Uruk Rager
card.text: Damage +1. Each time this minion wins a skirmish, the Free Peoples player must discard the top 2 cards of his or her draw deck.

card.name: Uruk Savage
card.text: Damage +1. (When this minion wins a skirmish, add 1 extra wound to the defender.)

card.name: Uruk Shaman
card.text: Damage +1. Maneuver: Remove {2} to heal an Uruk-hai.

card.name: Uruk Slayer
card.text: Damage +1. Skirmish: Remove {1} to make this minion strength +1 (limit +3).

card.name: Uruk Soldier
card.text: Damage +1. When you play this minion, you may make the Free Peoples player discard the top card of his draw deck.

card.name: Uruk Spy
card.text: Response: If the Ring-bearer puts on The One Ring, exert this minion. Discard a card from the top of your draw deck for each {Isengard} minion you spot. Add a burden for each Shadow card discarded in this way.

card.name: Uruk Warrior
card.text: Damage +1. Maneuver: Spot 6 companions to make this minion fierce until the regroup phase.

card.name: Uruk-hai Armory
card.text: Plays to your support area. While you can spot an Uruk-hai, the fellowship archery total is -1.

card.name: Uruk-hai Raiding Party
card.text: Damage +1. (When this minion wins a skirmish, add 1 extra wound to the defender.)

card.name: Uruk-hai Rampage
card.text: To play, spot an Uruk-hai. Plays to your support area. Response: If your Urukhai wins a skirmish, remove {3} to make him fierce until the regroup phase.

card.name: Uruk-hai Sword
card.text: Bearer must be an Uruk-hai. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, the Free Peoples player must discard the top card of his or her draw deck.

card.name: Wariness
card.text: Search. Response: If a stealth event is played, exert or discard your Uruk-hai to cancel that event.

card.name: ·Worry
card.text: To play, exert an Uruk-hai. Plays to your support area. Each time a companion or ally loses a skirmish involving an Uruk-hai, the opponent must choose to either exert the Ring-bearer or add a burden.

card.name: ·Ancient Chieftain
card.text: For each other {Moria} Orc you can spot, Ancient Chieftain is strength +1.

card.name: Bitter Hatred
card.text: Archery: Spot a {Moria} archer to wound an Elf.

card.name: ·Cave Troll of Moria, Scourge of the Black Pit
card.text: Damage +1. Fierce. To play, spot a {Moria} Orc. At an underground site, Cave Troll of Moria's twilight cost is -3.

card.name: ·Cave Troll's Hammer
card.text: Bearer must be Cave Troll of Moria. Cave Troll of Moria is damage +1.

card.name: Denizens Enraged
card.text: Skirmish: Make a {Moria} Orc strength +1 for each other {Moria} Orc you spot (limit +4).

card.name: Drums in the Deep
card.text: Skirmish: Make a {Moria} Orc strength +2 (or +4 if skirmishing a Dwarf).

card.name: The End Comes
card.text: Assignment: Spot 5 {Moria} minions to make the Free Peoples player assign the Ringbearer to a skirmish.

card.name: Fool of a Took!
card.text: Shadow: Spot a Hobbit (except the Ring-bearer) to reveal cards from the top of your draw deck until you reveal one that is not a {Moria} minion. Take the revealed cards into hand.

card.name: Frenzy
card.text: Assignment: Assign an exhausted companion (except the Ring-bearer) to skirmish a {Moria} Orc.

card.name: Goblin Archer
card.text: Archer. While you can spot another {Moria} Orc, the fellowship archery total is -6.

card.name: Goblin Armory
card.text: Plays to your support area. Each time you play a {Moria} weapon, add {1}. Response: If a {Moria} Orc is about to take a wound, discard this condition to prevent that wound.

card.name: Goblin Backstabber
card.text: This minion is damage +2 while in the same skirmish as another {Moria} Orc.

card.name: Goblin Domain
card.text: Search. To play, spot a {Moria} minion. Plays to your support area. Each time a companion is played to site 4 or higher, that companion comes into play exhausted.

card.name: Goblin Marksman
card.text: Archer. (Add 1 to the minion archery total.)

card.name: Goblin Runner
card.text: When you play this minion, you may add {2}.

card.name: Goblin Scavengers
card.text: When you play this minion, you may play a weapon from your discard pile on your {Moria} Orc.

card.name: Goblin Scimitar
card.text: Bearer must be a {Moria} Orc. When you play this possession, you may draw a card.

card.name: Goblin Sneak
card.text: When you play this minion, you may place a {Moria} Orc from your discard pile beneath your draw deck.

card.name: Goblin Spear
card.text: Bearer must be a {Moria} minion. If bearer kills a companion in a skirmish, add 1 burden (or 2 burdens if that companion was a Hobbit).

card.name: Goblin Swarms
card.text: Plays to your support area. Response: If your {Moria} Orc wins a skirmish, discard cards and wounds on that Orc and stack that Orc on this condition. Shadow: Play an Orc stacked here as if played from hand.

card.name: Goblin Wallcrawler
card.text: While at an underground site, this minion is strength +2. While you can spot another {Moria} Orc, the fellowship archery total is -1.

card.name: Goblin Warrior
card.text: When you play this minion, you may discard a {Dwarven} ally or {Dwarven} condition.

card.name: ·Guard Commander
card.text: Skirmish: Remove {3} to make a {Moria} Orc strength +2.

card.name: Host of Thousands
card.text: Shadow: Play a {Moria} Orc from your discard pile.

card.name: ·The Long Dark
card.text: Plays to your support area. When the fellowship moves to site 4 or 5, add {2} for each Dwarf companion. Skirmish: Discard this condition to make your {Moria} Orc strength +2.

card.name: Lost to the Goblins
card.text: Response: If the Ring-bearer exerts or takes a wound, discard a card from the top of your draw deck for each {Moria} minion you spot. For each Shadow card discarded in this way, add a burden (limit 3 burdens).

card.name: Moria Axe
card.text: Bearer must be a {Moria} Orc. Bearer is damage +1. Skirmish: Exert bearer to make him strength +2.

card.name: Moria Scout
card.text: When you play this minion, spot an Elf to add {2}.

card.name: Pinned Down
card.text: Plays to your support area. While you can spot a {Moria} archer, the fellowship archery total is -1.

card.name: Plundered Armories
card.text: Plays to your support area. Response: If your {Moria} weapon is discarded, play it from your discard pile (that weapon's twilight cost is -1).

card.name: Relentless
card.text: Search. Response: If a stealth event is played, spot 3 {Moria} minions to cancel that event.

card.name: Relics of Moria
card.text: Plays to your support area. Shadow: Remove {2} to play a {Moria} possession from your discard pile.

card.name: They Are Coming
card.text: Plays to your support area. Shadow: Discard 3 cards from hand to play a {Moria} Orc from your discard pile.

card.name: Threat of the Unknown
card.text: Shadow: Exert your {Moria} Orc to draw 2 cards.

card.name: Through the Misty Mountains
card.text: Search. To play, exert a {Moria} minion. Plays to your support area. Each time the fellowship moves to site 4, 5, or 6 and contains a Dwarf or Elf, the Free Peoples player discards 2 cards at random from hand.

card.name: ·Troll's Keyward
card.text: Cave Troll of Moria's twilight cost is -2.

card.name: The Underdeeps of Moria
card.text: Plays to your support area. Shadow: Remove {3} to reveal the bottom card of your draw deck. If it is a {Moria} Orc, take it into hand. Otherwise, discard it.

card.name: Unfamiliar Territory
card.text: Skirmish: Make a {Moria} Orc strength +2 (or +4 if skirmishing an archer).

card.name: What Is This New Devilry?
card.text: Search. To play, exert a {Moria} Orc. Plays to your support area. While the fellowship is at site 5 or higher, each companion's twilight cost is +2.

card.name: All Blades Perish
card.text: Response: If a Nazgûl is about to take a wound, prevent that wound.

card.name: All Veils Removed
card.text: Skirmish: Make a Nazgûl strength +2 (or +5 if the Ring-bearer wears The One Ring).

card.name: Beauty Is Fading
card.text: Maneuver: Exert a Nazgûl to discard a Free Peoples possession or Free Peoples condition. If you can spot no such card, discard an ally or companion (except the Ring-bearer) instead.

card.name: Bent on Discovery
card.text: Search. Plays to your support area. At the beginning of each of your Shadow phases, draw 1 card. At the end of each of your Shadow phases, exert a Nazgûl or discard this condition.

card.name: Black Breath
card.text: Plays to your support area. Skirmish: Transfer this condition from your support area to a character skirmishing a Nazgûl. Burdens and wounds may not be removed from bearer.

card.name: Black Steed
card.text: Bearer must be a Nazgûl. While at a plains site, bearer is strength +2. Discard this possession when at an underground site.

card.name: Blade Tip
card.text: Plays to your support area. Response: If your Nazgûl wins a skirmish, transfer this condition from your support area to the losing character. Limit 1 per character. Wound bearer at the start of each fellowship phase. (If bearer is the Ring-bearer, add a burden instead.)

card.name: Dark Whispers
card.text: Skirmish: Spot 3 burdens to make a Nazgûl strength +1 and damage +1, or spot 6 burdens to make a Nazgûl strength +3 and damage +2.

card.name: Drawn to Its Power
card.text: Plays to your support area. Each time a companion is killed in a skirmish involving a Nazgûl, add a burden.

card.name: Fear
card.text: Search. Maneuver: Exert your Nazgûl to discard an ally.

card.name: Frozen by Fear
card.text: Skirmish: Make a Nazgûl strength +2 (or +3 if the Ring-bearer is assigned to a skirmish that has not resolved).

card.name: In the Ringwraith's Wake
card.text: Response: If a Nazgûl wins a skirmish, the Free Peoples player chooses to either exert the Ring-bearer or add a burden.

card.name: The Master's Will
card.text: Search. Shadow: Spot X Nazgûl to reveal the top X cards of your draw deck. Take into your hand all {Ringwraith} cards revealed and discard the rest.

card.name: Morgul Blade
card.text: Bearer must be a Nazgûl. This weapon may be borne in addition to 1 other hand weapon. Skirmish: Discard this possession to transfer Blade Tip from your support area or discard pile to a companion bearer is skirmishing.

card.name: Morgul Gates
card.text: Shadow: Play a Nazgûl. His twilight cost is -2.

card.name: Nazgûl Sword
card.text: Bearer must be a Nazgûl. While you can spot 3 burdens, bearer is damage +1.

card.name: The Nine Servants of Sauron
card.text: Search. Plays to your support area. Each time you play a Nazgûl, you may exert a Hobbit (except the Ring-bearer).

card.name: Not Easily Destroyed
card.text: Plays to your support area. Maneuver or Skirmish: Remove {3} to heal a Nazgûl.

card.name: ·The Pale Blade
card.text: Bearer must be The Witch-king. He is damage +1. Response: If The Witch-king wins a skirmish, exert him to discard a Free Peoples condition.

card.name: Paths Seldom Trodden
card.text: Search. To play, spot a Nazgûl. Plays to your support area. Shadow: Remove {3} to replace the fellowship's site with your version of the same site.

card.name: Relentless Charge
card.text: Maneuver: Exert a Nazgûl to wound every archer companion.

card.name: Return to Its Master
card.text: Response: If the Ring-bearer wears The One Ring at the end of a skirmish phase, cancel all remaining assignments and assign a Nazgûl to skirmish the Ring-bearer; The One Ring's game text does not apply during this skirmish.

card.name: ·Sword of Minas Morgul
card.text: Bearer must be Úlairë Lemenya. He is damage +1. Skirmish: Exert Úlairë Lemenya to discard a possession borne by a character he is skirmishing.

card.name: Their Power Is in Terror
card.text: Maneuver: Exert a Nazgûl to wound every ally.

card.name: Threshold of Shadow
card.text: Skirmish: Make a Nazgûl strength +2 (or +4 if you spot 5 burdens).

card.name: The Twilight World
card.text: Response: If Ring-bearer puts on The One Ring, exert a Nazgûl to add 2 burdens.

card.name: ·Úlairë Attëa, Keeper Of Dol Guldur
card.text: Fierce. Skirmish: Remove {1} to make Úlairë Attëa strength +1 (limit +5).

card.name: ·Úlairë Cantëa, Lieutenant Of Dol Guldur
card.text: Fierce. Skirmish: Exert Úlairë Cantëa to discard a weapon borne by a character he is skirmishing.

card.name: ·Úlairë Enquëa, Lieutenant Of Morgul
card.text: Fierce. Maneuver: Spot 6 companions (or 5 burdens) and exert Úlairë Enquëa to wound a companion (except the Ring-bearer).

card.name: ·Úlairë Lemenya, Lieutenant Of Morgul
card.text: Each companion or ally who bears a {Ringwraith} condition is strength -2.

card.name: ·Úlairë Nelya, Lieutenant Of Morgul
card.text: Fierce. Shadow: Exert Úlairë Nelya and spot an opponent's site to replace it with your site of the same number.

card.name: ·Úlairë Nertëa, Messenger Of Dol Guldur
card.text: When you play Úlairë Nertëa, for each companion over 4, you may play 1 minion from your discard pile.

card.name: ·Úlairë Otsëa, Lieutenant Of Morgul
card.text: Shadow: Exert Úlairë Otsëa to make a {Ringwraith} minion fierce until the regroup phase.

card.name: ·Úlairë Toldëa, Messenger Of Morgul
card.text: Fierce. Assignment: Spot 4 burdens to assign a companion (except the Ring-bearer) to skirmish Úlairë Toldëa.

card.name: ·The Witch-king, Lord Of Angmar
card.text: Fierce. For each other Nazgûl you can spot, The Witch-king is strength +2.

card.name: Wreathed in Shadow
card.text: To play, spot a Nazgûl. Plays to your support area. Archery: Remove {1} to make the fellowship archery total -1.

card.name: All Thought Bent on It
card.text: Search. Maneuver: Spot a {Sauron} Orc and 5 companions to make the Free Peoples player exert a companion for each companion over 4.

card.name: Band of the Eye
card.text: Response: If this minion wins a skirmish, remove {2} to make the Free Peoples player discard a card at random from hand.

card.name: Curse From Mordor
card.text: Shadow: Spot a {Sauron} Orc to discard an {Elven} condition.

card.name: The Dark Lord's Summons
card.text: Search. To play, spot a {Sauron} Orc. Plays to your support area. Shadow: Remove {3} to reveal the top card of your draw deck. If it is a {Sauron} card, take it into hand. Otherwise, discard it and one other card from hand.

card.name: Despair
card.text: Maneuver: If the total number of burdens and companions in the dead pile is at least 12, spot a {Sauron} Orc to corrupt the Ringbearer.

card.name: Desperate Defense of the Ring
card.text: To play, exert a {Sauron} Orc. Plays on a companion. Each time bearer is assigned to a skirmish, the Free Peoples player chooses to either discard 3 cards from hand or add a burden.

card.name: Desperate Measures
card.text: Maneuver: Spot a {Sauron} Orc and remove a burden to make the Free Peoples player discard top 5 cards from his draw deck.

card.name: Enduring Evil
card.text: Skirmish: Spot X burdens to make a character skirmishing a {Sauron} Orc strength -X.

card.name: Enheartened Foe
card.text: Response: If a {Sauron} Orc wins a skirmish, make that Orc fierce until the regroup phase.

card.name: Forces of Mordor
card.text: Shadow: Spot X {Sauron} minions to add {X}.

card.name: Gleaming Spires Will Crumble
card.text: Plays to your support area. Each {Sauron} Orc skirmishing a {Gondor} character is strength +2. Discard this condition if your {Sauron} Orc loses a skirmish.

card.name: Hate
card.text: Maneuver: Exert a {Sauron} Orc to wound a companion (except the Ring-bearer).

card.name: A Host Avails Little
card.text: Search. Maneuver: Spot a {Sauron} Orc and 6 companions to wound a companion (except the Ring-bearer). Do this once for each companion over 5.

card.name: The Irresistible Shadow
card.text: To play, exert a {Sauron} Orc. Plays to your support area. If you can spot 5 burdens and the Free Peoples player has no cards in his or her draw deck, the Ring-bearer is corrupted.

card.name: Journey Into Danger
card.text: Search. To play, exert a {Sauron} Orc. Plays to your support area. While you can spot 5 companions, each companion's twilight cost is +2.

card.name: Mordor Enraged
card.text: Plays on a {Sauron} minion. Shadow: Exert bearer to add {1} for each archer companion.

card.name: Mordor's Strength
card.text: Skirmish: Exert a {Sauron} Orc to wound a character he is skirmishing.

card.name: Morgul Hunter
card.text: For each companion you can spot, this minion is strength +1.

card.name: Morgul Skirmisher
card.text: Maneuver: Remove {3} to exert a Hobbit (except the Ring-bearer).

card.name: Morgul Skulker
card.text: When you play this minion, you may shuffle up to 2 {Ringwraith} cards from your discard pile into your draw deck.

card.name: ·Morgul Warden
card.text: For each other {Sauron} Orc you can spot, Morgul Warden is strength +1.

card.name: The Number Must Be Few
card.text: Search. Plays to your support area. While you can spot 7 companions, the move limit for this turn is -1 (to a minimum of 1).

card.name: Orc Ambusher
card.text: Tracker. The roaming penalty for each {Sauron} minion you play is -1. Response: If a Free Peoples regroup event is played, exert this minion to cancel that event.

card.name: Orc Assassin
card.text: Tracker. The roaming penalty for each {Sauron} minion you play is -1. Assignment: Spot 2 Hobbit companions to make the Free Peoples player assign a Hobbit to skirmish this minion.

card.name: Orc Banner
card.text: Plays to your support area. Each time a {Sauron} Orc wins a skirmish, each {Sauron} Orc is strength +1 until the regroup phase.

card.name: Orc Bowmen
card.text: Plays to your support area. While you can spot a {Sauron} Orc, add 1 to the minion archery total.

card.name: Orc Butchery
card.text: Response: If a companion is killed by a {Sauron} Orc, the Free Peoples player must discard 3 cards from the top of his draw deck for each card in the dead pile.

card.name: Orc Chieftain
card.text: When you play a weapon on this minion, add {2} (limit once per turn).

card.name: Orc Hunters
card.text: Skirmish: Exert this minion to wound a character he is skirmishing.

card.name: Orc Inquisitor
card.text: When you play this minion, you may make the Free Peoples player discard a card at random from hand.

card.name: Orc Scimitar
card.text: Bearer must be a {Sauron} Orc. Skirmish: Remove {1} to make bearer strength +1 (limit +3).

card.name: Orc Scouting Band
card.text: Tracker. The roaming penalty for each {Sauron} minion you play is -1. Skirmish: Exert this minion to wound a character it is skirmishing.

card.name: Orc Soldier
card.text: Skirmish: Exert this minion to wound a character he is skirmishing.

card.name: Orc War Band
card.text: Skirmish: Exert this minion to wound a character it is skirmishing.

card.name: The Ring's Oppression
card.text: Response: If a {Sauron} Orc kills a companion, add 1 burden (or 3 if the Ringbearer wears The One Ring).

card.name: Sauron's Defenses
card.text: To play, exert a {Sauron} Orc. Plays to your support area. While there are 3 or more companions in the dead pile, the move limit for this turn is -1 (to a minimum of 1).

card.name: Seeking It Always
card.text: Search. Plays to your support area. Response: If a stealth event is played, exert a {Sauron} tracker to cancel that event.

card.name: Seeking Its Master
card.text: Plays to your support area. Shadow: Exert a {Sauron} Orc and remove {2} to draw a card.

card.name: Shadow's Reach
card.text: Shadow: Exert a {Sauron} Orc to discard a Free Peoples condition.

card.name: Strength Born of Fear
card.text: Plays to your support area. Skirmish: Remove {3} to make a {Sauron} Orc strength +1.

card.name: ·Thin and Stretched
card.text: To play, exert a {Sauron} Orc. Plays on the Ring-bearer. Add a burden at the end of each turn during which bearer was not assigned to a skirmish (and another companion was).

card.name: ·Tower Lieutenant
card.text: Each time this minion wins a skirmish, the Free Peoples player discards 2 cards at random from hand.

card.name: Under the Watching Eye
card.text: Search. To play, exert a {Sauron} tracker. Plays to your support area. Each time the fellowship moves, the Free Peoples player must exert a companion.

card.name: The Weight of a Legacy
card.text: To play, exert a {Sauron} Orc. Plays on Aragorn.

card.name: You Bring Great Evil
card.text: To play, spot a {Sauron} Orc. Plays on a companion (except an Elf). While at a sanctuary, bearer cannot heal.

card.name: ·Bilbo Baggins, Retired Adventurer
card.text: Fellowship: Exert Bilbo to shuffle a {Shire} card from your discard pile into your draw deck.

card.name: ·Bilbo's Pipe
card.text: Bearer must be a Hobbit. Fellowship: Discard a pipeweed possession and spot X pipes to shuffle X tales from your discard pile into your draw deck.

card.name: Bounder
card.text: Skirmish: Exert this ally to prevent a Hobbit from being overwhelmed unless that Hobbit's strength is tripled.

card.name: Extraordinary Resilience
card.text: Response: If the Ring-bearer is about to heal, remove a burden instead.

card.name: ·Farmer Maggot, Chaser of Rascals
card.text: Fellowship: Exert Farmer Maggot to heal Merry or Pippin.

card.name: ·Frodo, Old Bilbo's Heir
card.text: Ring-bearer (resistance 10). At the start of each of your turns, you may heal a Hobbit ally.

card.name: ·Frodo, Son of Drogo
card.text: Ring-bearer (resistance 10). Fellowship: Exert another companion who has the Frodo signet to heal Frodo.

card.name: ·The Gaffer, Sam's Father
card.text: Fellowship: Exert The Gaffer to heal Frodo or Sam.

card.name: ·The Gaffer's Pipe
card.text: Bearer must be a Hobbit. Fellowship: Discard a pipeweed possession and spot X pipes to remove {X}.

card.name: Halfling Deftness
card.text: Skirmish: Exert a Hobbit to make him strength +3.

card.name: Hobbit Appetite
card.text: Fellowship: Add {X} to heal a Hobbit companion X times.

card.name: Hobbit Farmer
card.text: While you can spot your site 1, this ally has the game text of that site. Fellowship: Exert this ally and spot opponent's site 1 to replace it with your site 1.

card.name: Hobbit Intuition
card.text: Stealth. Skirmish: At sites 1 to 4, cancel a skirmish involving a Hobbit. At any other site, make a Hobbit strength +3.

card.name: Hobbit Party Guest
card.text: At the start of each of your turns, heal this ally. Fellowship: Exert this ally to heal another Hobbit ally whose home is site 1.

card.name: Hobbit Stealth
card.text: Stealth. Skirmish: At sites 1 to 5, cancel a skirmish involving a Hobbit. At any other site, make a Hobbit strength +2.

card.name: Hobbit Sword
card.text: Bearer must be a Hobbit.

card.name: Longbottom Leaf
card.text: Pipeweed. Plays to your support area. When you play this possession, you may discard up to 2 cards from hand.

card.name: ·Master Proudfoot, Distant Relative of Bilbo
card.text: Fellowship: If the twilight pool has fewer than 3 twilight tokens, add {2} to reveal the top 3 cards of your draw deck. Take all {Shire} cards revealed into hand and discard the rest.

card.name: ·Merry, Friend to Sam
card.text: Skirmish: If Merry is not assigned to a skirmish, exert him twice to add his strength to another companion.

card.name: ·Merry, From O'er the Brandywine
card.text: While Merry bears a weapon, he is strength +2.

card.name: Noble Intentions
card.text: Skirmish: Exert a companion (except a Hobbit) to make a Hobbit strength +3.

card.name: Old Toby
card.text: Pipeweed. Plays to your support area. When you play this possession, you may draw a card.

card.name: ·Pippin, Friend to Frodo
card.text: Your opponent may not discard your {Shire} tales from play.

card.name: ·Pippin, Hobbit of Some Intelligence
card.text: When you play Pippin, remove a burden or wound from a companion.

card.name: Power According to His Stature
card.text: Skirmish: Add 1 burden to wound each minion skirmishing the Ring-bearer.

card.name: ·Rosie Cotton, Hobbiton Lass
card.text: Sam is strength +1. Fellowship: Exert Rosie to heal Sam.

card.name: ·Sam, Faithful Companion
card.text: Fellowship: Play Bill the Pony from your draw deck. Response: If Frodo dies, make Sam the Ring-bearer (resistance 5).

card.name: ·Sam, Son of Hamfast
card.text: Fellowship: Exert Sam to remove a burden. Response: If Frodo dies, make Sam the Ring-bearer (resistance 5).

card.name: Sorry About Everything
card.text: Fellowship: Exert a Hobbit companion to remove a burden.

card.name: ·Sting
card.text: Bearer must be Frodo. Fellowship or Regroup: Exert Frodo to reveal an opponent's hand. Remove {1} for each Orc revealed (limit {4}).

card.name: Stone Trolls
card.text: Tale. To play, spot Bilbo. Plays on any character. Limit 1 per character. Each time bearer skirmishes a Troll or Uruk-hai, bearer is strength +3.

card.name: Stout and Sturdy
card.text: Maneuver or Skirmish: Heal a Hobbit.

card.name: ·A Talent for Not Being Seen
card.text: Stealth. To play, exert a Hobbit. Plays to your support area. Each time the fellowship moves, spot 2 Hobbit companions to make the Shadow number -1 (or spot 4 to make it -2).

card.name: ·There and Back Again
card.text: Tale. Bearer must be a Hobbit companion. Maneuver: Discard this condition to make each Hobbit companion strength +2 until the regroup phase.

card.name: ·Thrór's Map
card.text: Plays to your support area. Fellowship or Regroup: Exert 2 Hobbits and discard Thrór's Map to play the fellowship's next site (replacing opponent's site if necessary).

card.name: Bag End
card.text: Fellowship: Exert a Hobbit to play The Gaffer from your draw deck.

card.name: East Road
card.text: Each companion's twilight cost is +2.

card.name: Farmer Maggot's Fields
card.text: Fellowship: Exert a Hobbit to play Merry or Pippin from your draw deck.

card.name: Green Dragon Inn
card.text: Fellowship: Exert a Hobbit to play Sam from your draw deck.

card.name: Green Hill Country
card.text: The twilight cost of each Hobbit is -1.

card.name: The Prancing Pony
card.text: Fellowship: Add a burden to play Aragorn from your draw deck.

card.name: Shire Lookout Point
card.text: Fellowship: Spot Gandalf to play Gandalf's Cart from your draw deck.

card.name: Westfarthing
card.text: Fellowship: Exert a Hobbit to play a companion or ally; that character's twilight cost is -1.

card.name: Bree Gate
card.text: While you can spot a ranger, the move limit is +1 for this turn.

card.name: Bree Streets
card.text: The roaming penalty for each Nazgûl you play to Bree Streets is -2.

card.name: Breeland Forest
card.text: Forest. Stealth events may not be played.

card.name: Bucklebury Ferry
card.text: River. While only Hobbits are in the fellowship, there are no assignment and skirmish phases at Bucklebury Ferry.

card.name: Ettenmoors
card.text: Plains. Skirmish: Exert your companion or minion to make that character strength +2.

card.name: Midgewater Marshes
card.text: Marsh. Each time a Hobbit moves to Midgewater Marshes, that Hobbit must exert.

card.name: Midgewater Moors
card.text: Plains. Each time a minion is played, the Free Peoples player discards a card from hand.

card.name: Trollshaw Forest
card.text: Forest. Each time you play a possession or artifact on your companion, draw a card.

card.name: Weatherhills
card.text: Each Nazgûl's twilight cost is -1.

card.name: Weathertop
card.text: Each Nazgûl at Weathertop is fierce.

card.name: Council Courtyard
card.text: Sanctuary. When the fellowship moves from Council Courtyard, remove {2}.

card.name: Ford of Bruinen
card.text: River. Sanctuary. The twilight cost of the first Nazgûl played to Ford of Bruinen each turn is -5.

card.name: Frodo's Bedroom
card.text: Sanctuary. Fellowship: Play a Hobbit to draw a card.

card.name: Rivendell Terrace
card.text: Sanctuary. Fellowship: Play a Man to draw a card.

card.name: Rivendell Valley
card.text: Sanctuary. Fellowship: Play an Elf to draw a card.

card.name: Rivendell Waterfall
card.text: Forest. Sanctuary. While you can spot a ranger at Rivendell Waterfall, the move limit is +1 for this turn.

card.name: Balin's Tomb
card.text: Underground. Maneuver: Discard your tale from play or from hand to heal your companion.

card.name: Dwarrowdelf Chamber
card.text: Underground. When the fellowship moves to Dwarrowdelf Chamber, Gimli or 2 other companions must exert.

card.name: Mithril Mine
card.text: Underground. Shadow: Remove {1} to play a Shadow weapon from your discard pile.

card.name: Moria Lake
card.text: Marsh. When the fellowship moves to Moria Lake, Frodo or 2 other companions must exert.

card.name: Moria Stairway
card.text: Underground. Each companion and minion bearing a hand weapon is damage +1.

card.name: Pass of Caradhras
card.text: Mountain. Shadow: Spot a {Isengard} minion to play a weather card from your draw deck (limit 1 per turn).

card.name: The Bridge of Khazad-dûm
card.text: Underground. Shadow: Play The Balrog from your draw deck or hand; The Balrog's twilight cost is -6.

card.name: Dimrill Dale
card.text: Sanctuary. The twilight cost of the first {Moria} Orc played each Shadow phase is -2.

card.name: Galadriel's Glade
card.text: Sanctuary. Fellowship: Exert an Elf to look at an opponent's hand.

card.name: Lothlórien Woods
card.text: Forest. Sanctuary. Each ally whose home is site 6 is strength +3.

card.name: Anduin Confluence
card.text: River. When the fellowship moves to Anduin Confluence, discard every ally.

card.name: Anduin Wilderland
card.text: Forest. River. While the fellowship is at Anduin Wilderland, skip the archery phase.

card.name: Silverlode Banks
card.text: River. When the fellowship moves to Silverlode Banks without a ranger, every companion must exert.

card.name: Anduin Banks
card.text: River. For each companion in the fellowship over 4, add 2 to the minion archery total.

card.name: Brown Lands
card.text: River. For each minion archer at Brown Lands, the minion archery total is +1 (limit +4).

card.name: Pillars of the Kings
card.text: River. Fellowship: Discard a {Gondor} card from hand to heal a {Gondor} companion.

card.name: Shores of Nen Hithoel
card.text: River. Shadow: Spot 5 Orc minions to prevent the fellowship from moving again this turn.

card.name: Emyn Muil
card.text: Maneuver: Exert your minion to make that minion fierce until the regroup phase.

card.name: Slopes of Amon Hen
card.text: The twilight cost of each {Isengard} minion is -1.

card.name: Summit of Amon Hen
card.text: When the fellowship moves to Summit of Amon Hen, each Shadow player may draw a card for each burden.

card.name: Tol Brandir
card.text: River. Shadow: Play up to 3 trackers from your discard pile; end your Shadow phase.

card.name: ·Gandalf, The Grey Wizard
card.text: Fellowship: Exert Gandalf to play a companion who has the Gandalf signet. The twilight cost of that companion is -2.

card.name: ·Aragorn, King in Exile
card.text: Ranger. At the start of each of your turns, you may heal another companion who has the Aragorn signet.
